name: Third Ball
description:
#RGBT
-(Third Ball) is the name of the game.
-The game is still in development.
-----
-Third Ball is game about ball physics and colors.
-The game introduces different types of challenges:
1-Color Matching: reach the (target score) within (time limit).
2-Reach the goal: move the ball in a (platforming challenge) to reach the (target hole) within (time limit).
3-Collect gems: collect all (gems) within (time limit).
4-Memory challenge: use your memory to memorize (numbers) OR (colors), and score the (target score) within (time limit).
-----
-(Third Ball) is developed by (N-Correct).
#RGBT
